Screenshot of headline reading: Renee Good's partner addresses Minneapolis immigration crackdown one month after killing

Becca Good has seldom spoken out since Renee Good was shot and killed by an ICE agent in Minneapolis on Jan. 7.

record.text: “Renee was not the first person killed, and she was not the last. You know my wife’s name and you know Alex’s name, but there are many others in this city being harmed that you don’t know—their families are hurting just like mine, even if they don’t look like mine.”

external.description: Ranger 56 had undergone an inspection just days before the helicopter's crash Wednesday night in Flagstaff, according to the Arizona Department of Public Safety.
external.title: DPS helicopter that crashed had been slated for replacement

record.text: In 2020, former Gov. Doug Ducey's budget request included funding to replace Ranger 56 in either FY2021 or FY2023. A subsequent governor's budget proposal, reviewed by ABC15 online, had pushed replacement to FY2025, but the helicopter remained in service.

external.title: DPS helicopter that crashed had been slated for replacement

record.text: Last week, I demanded answers from ICE again about inhumane conditions at Burlington, following up on my oversight visit. This is no place to hold people. Accountability now.

external.description: Navajo County officials continue to search for a teenager who went missing from his Joseph City home more than two years ago, distributing a new image of what the teen could look like today.
external.title: Age-progression photo released as search for missing Arizona teen Jarrett Brooks continues

record.text: Earlier this week, authorities have released a new age-progressed photo of Jarrett Brooks, a teen who went missing on July 4, 2023 in eastern Arizona.

external.title: Age-progression photo released as search for missing Arizona teen Jarrett Brooks continues

external.description: Phoenix fire crews rescued a man on Camelback Mountain after he suffered a life-threatening medical emergency near the Echo Canyon area.
external.title: Man rescued after life-threatening emergency on Camelback Mountain

record.text: Fire crews rescued a man who suffered life-threatening injuries on Camelback Mountain. Officials say he was taken down from the mountain and was taken to a hospital in extremely critical condition.

external.title: Man rescued after life-threatening emergency on Camelback Mountain
